name: Princesses Doesn't Cry
description:
Our game features an upset princess who decides to change her life around! Help her complete activities such as tidying her bedroom, watering her plants, and cleaning her floor so she can venture out of her tower.  

Use WASD to move around the room and use the mouse to click on objects to interact with them. Left-click to hold an object and right-click to put the object back in the inventory.

Please click the game to play.

Created by:

Francesca Taylor

Emili Hill

Freya Kelf

Henry Thompson
